overview: Vinodhan is an upcoming Tamil drama film directed by Victor Jayaraj and produced by Prabhu Deva. The film features Varun, Vedhika and Salony Luthra in the leading roles, while Madhan Karky has written the dialogues for the film. The film, which focusses on the issue of obsessive–compulsive disorder, will release in early 2016.
title: Vinodhan
